fulltext:
, France
Lille
hatrinh.htt@gmail.com
linkedin.com/in/cindee-hatrinh/
+33 7 66 53 28 89
SOFTWARE BUSINESS ANALYST
Ha Trinh (Cindee)
BIOGRAPHY
Happiness is a constant work-in-progress, thus this motive pushes me to strive for every single facets of my life, especially my career. Goal-
oriented and ambitous are what I’m describing myself. 
Being tech-savy, I worked as a business analyst/product owner to consult for new business ideas; and I’m approaching Global E-business master 
program to lift myself to the next professional level.
EXPERIENCE
Sep 2018 - Now
ALTERNATEEVE, Canada
UI DESIGNER (Freelancer)
◉ Designed intuitive products & create prototypes alongside product manager’s requirements, covered all possible scenarios 
◉ Contributed to product features by consulting the improvements & work flows
Nov 2016 - Aug 2018
NUS TECHNOLOGY, Vietnam
SOFTWARE BUSINESS ANALYST 
Project: Zens Inc. (Japan), Plantribe.io (US), Propmap (Germany)
◉ Co-built product functions with all clients using SCRUM method, consulted product roadmap based on their value propositions
◉ Maintained user stories, requirement specifications, created wireframes, mockups, UI design, prototypes for development team & stakeholder 
◉ Led (3+) development team & processes from requirement intake & prioritization, to manage products’ lifecycle by allocating HR
◉ Ensured market analytics (OTA API for Airbnb, Agoda) to be synchronized with clients’ input & current product performance to implement
◉ Domain knowledge: E-commerce, Travel & Hospitality, Healthcare, Automotive, Energy & Utilities
Business Analyst Trainer: NUS team
◉ Re-structured the training process, researched and standardized BA Training documents
◉ Trained 5+ new trainees, instructed both document-based and on-job-training; continuously carried out 360 feedbacks
Oct 2015 - Oct 2016
UBER, Vietnam
BUSINESS ASSOCIATE
Business Development - Partnership & CPR Program
◉ Acquired and managed (20+) business & (25+) event partnership to boost the user acquisitions and spread out Uber branding
◉ Managed (50+ events) as Offline Activation activities by creating new tactics and strategies, proposed strategies base on actual analytics 
on ambassadors’ performance
◉ Developed master plan, managed budget, communications, operation, logistics for On-demand campaign as well as analyzed CPR, CPI
EDUCATION
Sep 2018 - Now
University of Lille, France
Master 2, Global E-business
Sep 2011 - Aug 2015
BBA, Business Administration
FPT University, Vietnam
GPA: 8.1, Honor of Excellent Student
Honor of Outstanding Extracurricular Award 
Dec 2013 - May 2014
Exchange, Communication & Media
Universiti Brunei Darussalam, Brunei
Top 1% of junior chosen to be representative
PROFESSIONAL SKILLS
Tech & Design Skills
UI Design
Basic Database Design
Wireframes
SCRUM/Agile Product Management
Prototyping
Software Analysis
RECOGNITIONS
March 2016
Mentoring & Coaching Practice
RMIT University
|  Vietnam
LANGUAGES
ENGLISH
FRENCH
6.5 IELTS
A1 Level
